title: history
content:
I restyle this site a lot because eeeh… oh I don’t know. After a while I just get bored with the layout. Or sometimes I want to put to use the things I learned, like php or css (I love doing css, it’s nothing like programming or designing…and maybe it’s just plain stupid work but I love it).
Anyway… just to show you I was pretty bad at it once, here are the previous appearances of Sjeiti.com.

  • 1996 okt
  • 1997 jan
  • 1997 april
  • 1997 jun
  • 1997 sept
  • 1998 mrt
  • 1998 jun
  • 1998 nov
  • 1999 april
  • 2001 jan
  • 2001 sept
  • 2002 mrt
  • 2002 jan
  • 2003 mei
  • 2003 okt
  • 2004 jan
  • 2004 dec
